text: Federica Bilardo (born 6 July 1999) is an Italian tennis player. Bilardo has a career high WTA singles ranking of 547 achieved on 18 June 2018. She also has a career high WTA doubles ranking of 515 achieved on 24 June 2019. Bilardo made her WTA main draw debut at the 2019 Internazionali Femminili di Palermo in the doubles draw partnering Dalila Spiteri. ==ITF Finals== ===Singles (1–5)=== {|class="wikitable"
